```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Libraries
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

# Parameters
df <- read_csv(here::here("data/jl_output.csv"))
```


```{r}
# df %>% glimpse()

df %>% 
  filter(Year >= 2000, !(Domain %in% c("big data", "data mining"))) %>% 
  mutate(
    Domain = str_to_title(Domain),
    Domain = fct_reorder2(Domain, Year, Articles)
  ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Year, Articles, color = Domain)) +
  geom_smooth(se = F, method = "loess", size = 1) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_width(4)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_width(20)) +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(
    x = "Year of publication",
    y = "Number of articles published",
    caption = "Source: Data sourced from ERIC API"
  )

ggsave("figure_v2.png")

df %>% filter(Year == 2020)
```
